item.title: My welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @k1ll3r160 k1ll3r160
item.description:
@k1ll3r160 wrote:

i did think i should do a welcome screen so here it is

First scroll to the bottom of your client.java and throw this method in.

  public void LoginWelcome2() {
	if(playerRights  == 0) {
		sendQuest("@dre@Hey there "+playerName+" good to see you on smoke.", 8144); // Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8145);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@", 8148);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@",8149);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@",8150);
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	} else if(playerRights == 1) {
		sendQuest("@dre@Hey mod "+playerName+" good to see you on smoke.", 8144); // Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8145);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@", 8148);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@",8149);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@",8150);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command",8151);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod "+playerName+" has just logged on";
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	} else if (playerRights == 2) {
		sendQuest("@dre@Hey admin "+playerName+" good to see you on smoke.", 8144); // Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8145);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@", 8148);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@",8149);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@",8150);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@",8151);
		sendQuest("@dbl@your command@dbl@", 8152);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin "+playerName+" has just logged on";
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	} else {
		sendQuest("@dre@Hey owner "+playerName+" good to see you on smoke.", 8144); // Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dre@You know your Commands", 8145);
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "OWNER "+playerName+" has just logged on";
		sendQuestSomething(8143);
		showInterface(8134);
		flushOutStream();
	}
 }

Then search for "sendMessage("Welcome to “+ServerCP.Servername);” under that add

LoginWelcome2();

remeber to edit your commands

Read full topic
